👙 Collab or business : elisabethrioux@live.fr 💕 VLOG - Hawaii with Claudia 👇🏽

posts.description: My travel partner who's now becoming my coloc ✈️🌍😍 We will vlog every week, maybe one, 2 or 3 vlogs per week we don't know yet but our first vlog is coming out tomorrow on my youtube channel, hope you are excited as much as I am 🙏🏽

Missing this so much, which island do you think is the most beautiful in the Caribbean ? We are trying to find a new destination as cool as Aruba was with the flamingos to get some cool picture with the NEW HOAKA DESIGN (coming in around 3 weeks) 😍 @hoaka_swimwear 👙 ps : can you see the hidden flamingo 😏

I had such a bad week, I've been so sad lately and it made me realize how difficult it is to be far from the love of my life. Long distance relationship can be difficult sometimes, I was sad alone 😞 but don't worry, my baby came to Canada to save me, he brought my smile with him and I can't be happier now ❤️ no girls you don't need a men to be happy, but it is always better to have someone with you when you feel sad, it can be your friend, your mother, or anyone you feel comfortable with 🙏🏽 for me it is jonathan 🌹

Why would I mention 900k and not 899k 🤔 Thank you all for 899k ❤️😍 I was really not expecting to get there and this is because of all of you, I just cant believe in 101k I'll be at 1m, this is just.. I dont know, just thank you all, thank you for being gold and following me in my adventure with my lovely boyfriend and also my business and passion @hoaka_swimwear ✨ I'm happy I can use that 'popularity' (i dont like to talk like that 😩) to make girls better in their skin and also spead happinest and motivation 🌴🙊

Small nose, small cheeks, big lips, big eyes, on fleek eyebrows, perfect teeth, long eyelashes, strong jawline.... those are the things people are looking at on instagram, those are the things girls want because of the beauty standards at the moment. I used to look at myself and hope to have those caracteristics, probably some of you still do but I wanted to make you realise something I realised : I have big cheeks, Claudia tihan doesnt have the "perfect" smile, savannah montano has a "big" nose, alexis ren doesn't have the "perfect" eyebrows, ariana grande has small eyes, etc etc , I could name so many girls like that. If you see this as  insults, you just don't understand what I am trying to say. I want you to realise that this is the girls you (me include) look up to, they are all perfect to me and probably to you too even if they don't have all of those caracteristics so why can't you be ? The thing those girls have is : CONFIDENCE ! Confidence is the key, getting all of these caracteristic wont make you more beautiful but being confident will, trust me ✨ I read something from a girl on instagram yesterday, she will recognize herself, and it made me think about me before I realized that so I was not the only one thinking like that so I made her realize who she is and what she worth and now I want all of you to realize it 🙏🏽

Current situation (nothing about the picture 🙃) : I just landed in Canada, Jonathan is still in india, suppose to leave in 2 days but the thing is : I got his passport with me in Canada 🙂 Anyone flying to mumbai tonight or tomorrow from montreal ? 🙏🏽 i want him to come here and to Brazil so bad :(

Mumbai was such a beautiful adventure, next stop Montreal ✈️ only for 4 days caus right after we are leaving for Rio de Janeiro, Brazil 🌍 I'm so lucky to travel the world with the love of my life, really grateful about it 🙏🏽❤️

40 degrees celcius in Mumbai and I have to wear pants 🙂 but the most difficult part is to not cuddle with jonathan all day because here, it is seen like "public affection", you cannot do that in the part of mumbai where I am 🙊 I love to discover the indian culture, it's so different ✨
In 2 days I'll be on my way to see the love of my life in India, he's the reason of my happiness and I can't wait to live with him after our special event in India ❤️
